Package interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.control.diagram

Class CommunicationView

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.control.diagram.DiagramView
      • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.control.diagram.CommunicationView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DiagramObserver, CommandHandler

    public class CommunicationView
extends DiagramView
    A class of communication views. Communication views display diagrams as a composite of parties with messages sent between them. Parties can be located at any coordinate.

    • Constructor Summary

      CommunicationView​(Diagram diagram, Rectangle frame)
      Initialize this new diagram view with the given diagram and given frame.
